name: Cypher Squad
description: Earth, year 3.501.  It's been six years since the first alien spaceship landed on our planet.   The human nations since then rallied their military forces, leaving the problems among themselves for a former date, if they manage to win the war. However, 51% of the Earth surface now belongs to these invaders.  From that point on the Nations of the world were forced to suffer deep changes onto their foundations, since all the military power had to be augmented threefold, otherwise we wouldn't be here right now. As the strategist member of the Unified Earth Army (UEA), its' your responsibility  to guide your squad using your wits and trickery to lead special missions against strategic targets from aliens that had settled close to your location.  Let's free our home from these invaders.  Godspeed.
